name: Creepers (itch)
description:
Survival shoot-em-up game for the unexpanded commodore vic20

Stop the creepers from reaching the bottom of the screen,  they will try to deflect your shots and will get faster as time goes by.  Let the creeper get too long and it will toughen and be harder to shoot down.

My first game for the vic20 for many years,  uses built-in graphics but written in machine code for speed.

Hope you enjoy it.
